description: Automatically run linting tools after file modifications. Supports ESLint for JavaScript/TypeScript, Pylint for Python, and RuboCop for Ruby.

hooks.command: if [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.js || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.jsx || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx ]]; then npx eslint "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --fix 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then pylint "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.rb ]]; then rubocop "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --auto-correct 2>/dev/null || true; fi
